body: They do this out of spite since apparently someone said something to them that pissed them off so they decided to ruin EVERYONES fun by spamming this shit everywhere.  What's sad is that there are many doujins where this is literally the ONLY version available online with the books themselves no longer available anywhere.
@StickSwinger I totally agree with you, in facts, if you sucks on scans, don't do It anymore
